Welcome to Img3Sum’s documentation!

Img3Sum is an open-source project thatOpen-source project that supports translating, summarizing and converting images to text.

Introduction

The purpose of this tool is to organize text images into three lines for those who are not fluent with English and who don’t want to read the entire English document

Features

  • Optical character recognition of an image file with English text

  • (planned) Check for grammatical errors in extracted English text

  • Summarize extracted English text to 3 sentences and translate to Korean

  • (planned) Optical character recognition of an image file with Korean text

  • (planned) Summarize extracted Korean text to 3 sentences
